changes: Fixed an issue, where some .wav files couldn't be played. (Example: beeyetch.wav)
Fixed an issue, if Sounds directory was invalid, TS wouldn't start
Can select "beta" version as update channel" - See settings
Perceptual audio normalization off by default, until it's unstable
Overlay window doesn't appear on the taskbar
Overlay not half-transparent anymore, but text has outline
Fix for push-to-talk support, that broke voice activation detection in the previous version.
Mp3 support. (Or anything that Windows can read by default.)
Overlay show what's currently playing, and also the person who requested it, if it's from Twitch.
